column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston//// The rest of us all got tonkatsu black and there was again definitely some quality concerns. Of the 4 only 2 I would say were good. 1 came out warm. Almost like it was sitting on a counter for far too long. Idk what happened with the other tonkatsu black
column2: but the soup was definitely more red than the other 3. Like the red implied the soup was unusually spicy. My friend doesn't have a high spice tolerance so he really couldn't enjoy it. To make matters worse 3 of the 5 of us complained the next day about a bad stomach ache. Maybe mild food poisoning?
